title: Good Omens - Book Trailer [Terry Pratchett & Neil Gaiman]
author: Rachel Wasserman
comment: Just rewatching to increment the hype. This is so good <3

You know, Amazon also used a Queen song in their trailer for the TV show. Isn't that a funny coincidence?
Never mind. I just realized there's a recurring joke in the book about Queen.
I love that you used the audiobook! This is way better than so many fan trailers I've seen. Thank you!
1:16 woah, are those books in the shape of wings?? And the light makes a halo! That's so creative!
description:
Book trailer for "Good Omens" by Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman. Armageddon is almost upon us! The forces of Good and Evil are amassing for a final confrontation. But two immortal beings, an angel and a demon, having lived among humans for several millennia, have grown quite fond of them. They decide to work together to stop the Antichrist from ending the world. Only one thing stands in their way: the Antichrist, a very nice young boy named Adam, has gone missing.

This book is seriously funny! Seriously. Funny. Watch the trailer. Read the book. (Or listen to it on audio!) You'll thank me. Age range: 12+

Music is "The Prophet's Song" by Queen from the album "A Night at the Opera". 

I would also like to thank the artists at
